blockGainer.NAME: Block Gainer
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yBlock, if your block is less than your maximum health, gain
block again. (Body Slam is not effected)

PVPVelvetChoker.NAME: Velvet Choker
PVPVelvetChoker.FLAVOR: "Immense power, but too limited." - Kublai the Great
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with an additional [E] .
or less cards during your turn, gain [E] at the start of your next turn.

PVPEctoplasm.NAME: Ectoplasm
PVPEctoplasm.FLAVOR: This blob of slime and energy seems to pulse with life.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take unblocked damage, enemy steals 5 #ygold.

PVPSozu.NAME: Sozu
PVPSozu.FLAVOR: You notice that magical liquids seem to lose their properties when near this relic.
DESCRIPTIONS: at the start of your turn. Remove one potion slot.
If you have no potions, gain [E]

BloodPercent.NAME: 灵体外质
BloodPercent.FLAVOR: 这团黏液与能量的混合物微微脉动，仿佛有着生命。

OrangePelletsChange.NAME: Red Pellets
OrangePelletsChange.FLAVOR: “There used to be an orange pelletes in PVPMOD, but it was sold out.”
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower, #yAttack, and #ySkill in the same turn, remove all your debuffs for the rest of this turn.
